doc:
Leslie Brooks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_Brooks 0 Leslie Brooks (born Virginia Leslie Gettman, July 13, 1922 – July 1, 2011) was an American film actress, model and dancer. Born in Lincoln, Nebraska, her parents brought her to Southern California at an early age, where around 1940 she started work as a photographic model. At the beginning of her showbiz career she appeared as Lorraine Gettman.As Leslie Brooks, she began appearing in movie bit roles for Columbia in 1941. Brooks started landing more sizable parts in such movies as Nine Girls (1944), Cover Girl (1944), and the lead in the film noir classic Blonde Ice (1948). She retired from films in 1949, but returned to make one last film in 1971. Leslie_Brooks ( born Virginia_Leslie_Gettman , July_13_,_1922 – July_1_,_2011 ) was an_American_film_actress , model_and_dancer . Born in Lincoln , Nebraska , her_parents brought her to Southern_California at an_early_age , where around_1940 she started work as a_photographic_model . At the_beginning of her_showbiz_career she appeared as Lorraine_Gettman.As_Leslie_Brooks , she began_appearing in movie_bit_roles for Columbia in 1941 . Brooks started_landing more_sizable_parts in such_movies as Nine_Girls ( 1944_) , Cover_Girl_(_1944_) , and the_lead in the_film_noir_classic_Blonde_Ice_(_1948_) . She retired from films in 1949 , but returned_to_make one_last_film in 1971 .
